name: ARROWHEAD
description:
Arrowhead was supposed to be a game where you have to defend the WASD (World Authority of Ship Driving) from outside menaces, for the mini jam 6
But I only "finished" one boss, and had to submit late.
It should be super hard btw. good luck



will flesh out the game a bit more later


Made with Haskell and SFML.
Source : https://gitlab.com/WitchKnight/Arrowhead
